TextView.android:text: This is the first remedy of scrofulous group. It is also called universal remedy. It is best adapted to person of lymphatic temperament, and to those of any other temperament who are subjected to glandular enlargement and phlegm nous inflammations. First effect of S1 is on stomach and then lymphatic system. Like other remedies, scrofulous seems to have a double action, one upon the constitution and upon special local conditions. In treating complex complaints, it is well to give the remedy in two forms-in dilution to act upon constitution and in massive dose to act upon the special local disorders When for instance, indigestion is complicated with herpetic, rheumatic, or gouty diathesis, a massive dose may be given at meal-time to correct the disorders of the digestive system; and the remedy may be taken in dilution during the day to constitutional diathesis. The various dilutions of scrofulous have their own peculiar effects. The first dilution should be used in acute cases, the second dilution in chronic cases, and the third dilution is often necessary in the treatment of nervous disorders, such as hysteria or epilepsy.
